title: Internship at General Dynamics - Ottawa, Ontario
description: Joined General Dynamics as a Vetronics Software intern. While I was only there for four months, I learned a lot about SoC integration and bringup as well as the benefits and drawbacks to running code in an embedded linux environment.

title: Internship at Teck Resources Limited - Sparwood, BC
description: When I wasn't mountain biking I was working on a high-speed transient detection system with Teck's Mining Systems team.

title: Second fire season with BCWS - Fort Nelson, BC
description: My second wildfire season and first one where things actually happened. During this time I learned two things: 1. Nothing makes one grateful for the modern workplace environment quite like being stuck in a smoky mosquito infested swamp for sixteen hours and 2. Helicopters and chainsaws are really cool.

title: Started University at UBC
description: First year was remote so I didn't even know what the campus looked like until second year.

title: First fire season with BCWS - Vanderhoof, BC
description: Thought it would be cool to be a firefighter. Unfortunately the 2020 season in BC was lacking in fires so I mostly just ended up going for a lot of runs and driving around in the bush.

title: Graduation; Vanderhoof, BC
description: Won a $20 bet that my last name would get mispronounced when I got called up.
